record1.<1>: Configure defaults, handlers, and allowed routines for RUN_OECGI_REQUEST
record1.<2>: When using RUN_OECGI_REQUEST as the "listener" routine for handling web requests, you can configure various routines to check security, handle errors, and do any post-processing.  In addition, you can specify which INET routines should be processed.

<3>.<3,1>: Name of security routine to run {DEFAULT INET_SECURITY}
<3>.<3,2>: Name of post-processing routine to run {DEFAULT INET_FINALIZE}
<3>.<3,3>: Name of error handler routine to run {DEFAULT INET_ABORTED}

record1.<4>: Error message to return {TEXTAREA 5}{DEFAULT Cannot process query:%query%}{WIDTH 40}
